hostname P2
buggy

logging syslog informational local7 172.20.20.1

crypto rsakey rsa import $v10$
!
crypto dsakey dsa import $v10$
!
crypto ecdsakey ecdsa import $v10$TUhRQ0FRRUVJQUNhbXhoMnA4TU5GTnRDeHN5MVhMOW5IV0xzcmRTdjNSWngvYmlBbDZWZ29BY0dCU3VCQkFBS29VUURRZ0FFQ3p6ZHVnWWJpKzZxK3BkYjRlZ1k0em9WbXVmZ2xaUGpBOFhCQTBlSzJYQXlxVkg2eXZPczVpbkNCNWRBT0pHRnR0N2I1d25SaUliUFA3Tzd2V29hOWc9PQ==

aaa userlist usr
 username rare

scheduler errors
 time 600000
 delay 30000
 command clear errors freerror@nop.hu
 start
 exit
!
prefix-list ALL4
 sequence 10 permit 0.0.0.0/0 ge 0 le 0
 exit
!
prefix-list ALL6
 sequence 10 permit ::/0 ge 0 le 0
 exit

bundle 101
 exit
!
bundle 111
 exit
!
bundle 17
 exit
!
bundle 18
 exit
!
vrf definition DEF_SEGROUT
 exit
!
vrf definition OOB
 exit
!
router ospf4 10
 vrf DEF_SEGROUT
 router-id 100.100.100.20
 traffeng-id 0.0.0.0
 segrout 500 base 12000
 area 0 enable
 area 0 spf-ecmp
 area 0 segrout
 ecmp
 exit
!
interface loopback1
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 100.100.100.20 255.255.255.255
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 passive
 router ospf4 10 segrout index 15
 router ospf4 10 segrout node
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle101
 description PE_A
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 10.100.128.6 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 2000
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle111
 description PE_B
 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 10.100.129.6 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 2000
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle17

 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 700
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit
!
interface bundle18

 vrf forwarding DEF_SEGROUT
 ipv4 address 10.100.136.5 255.255.255.252
 mpls enable
 router ospf4 10 enable
 router ospf4 10 area 0
 router ospf4 10 cost 700
 no shutdown
 log-link-change
 exit

interface ethernet1

 no shutdown

 exit
!
interface ethernet2

 no shutdown

interface ethernet4
